descriptionHtml:
Adds 6 new Circlets to the crafting menu.

These are plain and simple ring shaped circlets. Under the Jewelry section "Circlet Silver" Is the first one.

Update 1.4 final:
1. Fixed the ground models so they show in inventory.
2. Fixed the way the textures show so they are displayed correctly.

This is the final version because they are now integrated into
[a href="http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51376/"]Simply Circlets[/a] un an unarmored version.

This is a mod resource. Use them in any mod you want for a Bethesda game. Just credit me as the original author.

[spoiler]
